text: SHANTAKARAM BHUJANGASHAYANAM PADMANABHAM SURESHAM, VISHWADHARAM GAGAN SADRISHAM MEGHAVARNAM SHUBHANGAM| LAKSHMIKANTAN KAMALNAYANAM YOGIMIRDHYANA GAMYAM, VANDE VISHNUM BHAVA BHAYAHARAM SARVA LOKAIKNATHAM || Meaning:
I worship that Lord Vishnu who has a peaceful body (postures);
who rests on Sheshanaga (the mighty serpant - cobra);
who has a lotus in his navel, who is the base of the world, who is like the sky;
who has a colour like cloud, who is the lord of Lakshmi (wealth);
who is seen by yogis in their meditation;
who is the remover of all the differences and who is the only Lord of all the three Lokas (Worlds), I worship such Lord Vishnu.
title: Reflection of Scriptural Appearance
